img.alt: Child Nutrition Dept. to Provide Meal Service through May 1

a.span: Child Nutrition Dept. to Provide Meal Service through May 1

div.p: Curbside meal service will continue through Friday, May 1, as planned, including Friday, April 10, and during the district’s spring break from Monday, April 13, through Friday, April 17.

a.title: Go to comments for Child Nutrition Dept. to Provide Meal Service through May 1

div.p: We encourage our students to continue learning at home with the online support of our teachers and staff while the district is closed to protect our community from the spread of COVID-19.

a.title: Go to comments for NCISD Continued Learning Plans

a.span: A Message from the Board of Trustees

div.p: The Board of Trustees stands with New Caney ISD community during this difficult time.

a.title: Go to comments for A Message from the Board of Trustees
Subscribe to RSS Feed - Headlines & Features
a.span: Subscribe to RSS Feed - Headlines & Features

p.strong: SCHOOLS REMAIN CLOSED FOR REMAINDER OF 2019-20 SCHOOL YEAR

span.p: In complying with Governor Greg Abbott’s Executive Order, all New Caney ISD school buildings and facilities will remain closed for the remainder of the 2019-20 school year. We will provide updates as soon as possible about how this impacts services, activities, and events, including high school graduations, as more information becomes available.

The current program for continuing education services and meal services after spring break remains in place. Updates will be posted to the district website and sent to parents and staff through the district’s notification system.

p.span: The district continues to take precautionary measures to protect students and staff as well as assist public health officials in their goal of containment. Families are encouraged to visit the
for information and travel guidance regarding COVID-19.

p.strong: LAS ESCUELAS PERMANECEN CERRADAS POR EL RESTO DEL AÑO ESCOLAR 2019-20

p.span: Al cumplir con la orden ejecutiva del Gobernador Greg Abbott, todas las escuelas e instalaciones de New Caney ISD permanecerán cerradas por el resto del año escolar 2019-20. Mandaremos mensajes a medida que haya más información disponible sobre cómo esto afecta las actividades y eventos, incluyendo las graduaciones de las preparatorias.

span.p: Los programas para servicios educativos continuos por Internet y servicios de comidas continuarán después de las vacaciones de primavera. Las actualizaciones se publicarán en nuestra página web y se enviarán a los padres y empleados a través de nuestro sistema de notificaciones.

p.span: El distrito continúa tomando medidas de precaución para proteger a los estudiantes y empleados y también apoya a los funcionarios de salud pública en su objetivo de contención. Se alienta a las familias a visitar la
para obtener información y orientación sobre viajes con respecto a COVID-19.
